meanings.definition: A type of single-celled organism that can cause disease in humans and animals.
meanings.sent1: Endamebas are tiny organisms that can make people and animals sick.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study endamebas to understand how they spread diseases.
meanings.sent3: The endamebas in the pond were having a party, but no one wanted to attend!
meanings.sent4: The endamebas multiplied rapidly, like a wildfire spreading through a forest.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the endamebas looked like little troublemakers causing chaos.
